fields.title: Piano Improvisation - Fundamentals for Creating Music on the Spot
fields.about_the_course:
Have you ever wanted to be able to play anything on your piano on demand? Ever seen images by the greats and wonder how they manage to create incredible images off the top of their heads?

This course is designed to get you playing along and to give you a head start in your landscape painting journey regardless of what software you use.

No music theory required!

All you need is basic drawing skill and some inspiration. In this course, you'll overcome many of the fears and questions you've had surrounding the art of landscape painting and we'll tackle a variety of ways you can get better including:

  • Brushes to use
  • How to master composition
  • How to make your artwork look natural
  • How to use leading lines to make your painting more interesting and dynamic
  • Much more!!

This course is loosely based on landscape painting, a little bit of seascape painting on the way, but the concepts apply to painting universally. No matter what you want to be able to paint, this is a great place to start!

fields.title: Try Django: Learn and Master the Web Framework
fields.about_the_course:
What is Django?

Django is a free, open source, high-end framework written in the famously simple, flexible, and relatively easy-to-learn Python programming language.

Django is a high-level Python web framework that enables rapid development of secure and maintainable websites. This website you are reading this on is developed with Django.

No computer science theory knowledge required!

All you need is basic drawing skill and some inspiration. In this course, you'll overcome many of the fears and questions you've had surrounding the art of landscape painting and we'll tackle a variety of ways you can get better including:

  • Brushes to use
  • How to master composition
  • How to make your artwork look natural
  • How to use leading lines to make your painting more interesting and dynamic
  • Much more!!

This course is loosely based on landscape painting, a little bit of seascape painting on the way, but the concepts apply to painting universally. No matter what you want to be able to paint, this is a great place to start!
